programme.desc: Um voo sai dos Estados Unidos para o Japo, durante as dez horas de voo os passageiros pensam em como se distrair ... at perceberem uma presena estranha e sobrenatural dentro do avio.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Selene, uma guerreira vampira, est imersa em um conflito entre vampiros e lobisomens, enquanto se apaixona por Michael, um humano que procurado por lobisomens por razes desconhecidas.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Aps perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporao militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: Tempestade de Meteoros, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Para a astrnoma Michelle Young, um evento celestial nico se transforma em um pesadelo quando milhares de meteoros rompem a superfcie da atmosfera e bombardeiam a cidade de San Francisco.

programme.title: Corao de Drago, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial (Jackie Chan) tem a difcil tarefa de cuidar do seu irmo deficiente mental, Sammo. Quando Sammo, acidentalmente se envolve num roubo, ele sequestrado por bandidos e Jackie, tem que salv-lo.

programme.title: A Fuga, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Para sair da priso, um criminoso pede a esposa para negociar sua liberdade com um chefe da mfia. Mas quando o plano d errado, o casal tenta fugir para o Mxico.

programme.title: Tuff Turf: O Rebelde, (1985, Drama)
programme.desc: Prestes a terminar o terceiro ano do segundo grau, Morgan se v obrigado a mudar de estilo de vida passando a frequentar os subrbios da cidade onde vive, ao invs do clube de garotos ricos.

programme.title: Eu, Christiane F. - 13 Anos, Drogada e Prostituda, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Nos anos 1970, em Berlim, uma adolescente se torna viciada em herona. Tudo em sua vida comea a distorcer e lentamente desaparece medida que ela se torna amiga de um pequeno grupo de viciados e se apaixona por um viciado em drogas.

programme.title: 41 DP - Inferno no Bronx, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Este interessante e pouco lembrado drama policial trs Paul Newman no papel do veterano policial Murphy que atua no bairro do Bronx, lugar extremamente violento nos anos setenta e oitenta.

programme.title: Temporada de Caa, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Wade Whitehouse um policial de uma pequena cidade. Isolado das pessoas ao seu redor, incluindo um pai dominador e uma mulher divorciada, ele se torna obcecado com a resoluo de um acidente de caa fatal, levando a uma srie de acontecimentos trgicos.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da mfia japonesa suspeita de ser vtima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: O Legionrio, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Na Marselha dos anos 20, lutador de boxe vence luta que deveria perder de propsito. Para fugir dos gngsters que buscam vingana, resolve se alistar na Legio Estrangeira, onde enfrenta os horrores da batalha no inspito deserto do Marrocos.

programme.title: The Music of Silence, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme biogrfico sobre o tenor e msico italiano Andrea Bocelli. Apesar de ter nascido com um grave problema de viso que terminar em cegueira, Bocelli supera todos os tipos de obstculos, guiado por grandes ambies em relao sua paixo, a msica.

programme.title: Grandes Olhos, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Pintora e defensora das causas feministas, a norte-americana Margaret Keane enfrenta um de seus maiores desafios ao levar ao tribunal o prprio marido. Em um perodo em que o reconhecimento de um trabalho feminino era difcil.

programme.title: Abrao, (1993, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Deus decide fazer uma nova promessa humanidade depois das calamidades que culminaram no desastre da Torre de Babel. Abrao escolhido para torna-se o Pai das Naes e a histria da redeno se inicia.

programme.title: O Milagre, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Um novo professor enviado para trabalhar numa pequena vila que sequer possui uma escola. L, ele logo faz amizade com um simptico homem deficiente. O professor rene os moradores para construir uma escola ali para ensinar as crianas e seu novo amigo.

programme.title: O Que Fazer?, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois de saber que s tem 90 minutos de vida, por conta de um aneurisma no crebro, um homem infeliz quer fazer as pazes com todos aqueles que foram magoados por ele.

programme.title: O Fsico, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: No sculo XI, um rfo carente viaja para a Prsia para estudar medicina com um renomado curandeiro.

programme.title: Lute Por Sua Vida, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme focado em um grupo de pessoas obcecadas por um livro de autoajuda. medida que o livro se torna mais popular, ele afeta uma estranha variedade de personagens. Suas vidas se cruzam, gerando mudanas que duraro para sempre.

programme.title: Em Busca de um Milagre, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: O mundo do doutor Luke Matthew desaba quando ele perde o amor de sua vida e se torna pai na mesma noite. Quando ele contrata Sage como a nova bab, os dois comeam a perceber que a melhor forma de remdio deixar ir.

programme.title: Kilza revela-se uma adversria assustadora usando a engenhosidade das crianas para espalhar bales monstruosos por toda a cidade ao mesmo tempo em que Jaspion atacado.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Boomerman e Jaspion devem impedir os planos de Macgaren e Silk, um monstro da mfia japonesa.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Surgiu um novo aliado de Macgaren chamado Tip, a convite de Kilza, com a finalidade de fabricar e vender robs em Tquio. Na verdade esses robs produzidos explosivos e esto programados para destruir toda a cidade.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Kilza novamente usa criaes para realizar seus planos. Dessa vez controlando suas mentes atravs de um talism que deixa invejosas e malignas.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Jaspion encontra o filho do professor e cientista Katayama. O menino est chateado por sentir a ausncia do pai, mas na verdade o professor foi sequestrado pela quadrilha de Macgaren para projetar uma fortaleza indestrutvel.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Jaspion e Kanoko sonham com sete raios de luz que atingem cinco crianas, um heri e um beb. Edin vem Terra ajuda-los a interpretar o sonho.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Edin leva a famlia Nanbara para o seu mundo, um porto seguro contra os ataques de Satan Goss. Enquanto isso, Kilza e Macgaren executam seu prximo plano.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Miki uma menina com poderes sobrenaturais. Resgatada por Macgaren de um desmoronamento ela pressionada a ajud-lo. Macgaren usa o poder de Miki para corromper os cidados da vila.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: A irm da bruxa Kilza, Kilmaza, surge com os ninjas espaciais e pe em prtica seu plano de fazer as pessoas odiarem Jaspion.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Kilmaza implanta diamantes falsos na terra para corromper o corao das pessoas e trazer caos ao pas
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: John Tiger um ex-assassino profissional e amigo de infncia de Jaspion. Abandonou o caminho do crime com muito tempo e cuida de um orfanato, mas Kilmaza surge para enfeiti-lo. Jaspion ter que enfrent-lo em um duelo mortal para quebrar o feitio.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Durante uma viagem espacial, os cientistas do planeta Brain Dr. Pab, Dra. Mam e seu filho Pep so raptados pelo Sindicato da Treva Galctica ao mando de Kilmaza.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.sub-title: A histria de Pep e Hiroshi

programme.title: Satan Goss comea sua metarmorfose. uma transformao dolorosa que provoca nele acessos de fria incontrolvel. Para acalm-lo, Kilmaza e Macgaren procuram sacrificar uma menina em um ritual maligno.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.sub-title: O misterioso mundo de Satan Goss

programme.title: Aps a metamorfose Satan Goss exerce seu grande poder alterando a superfcie da Terra e transformando-a numa floresta de monstros gigantes.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: A sede de destruio de Satan Goss no tem tamanho. Macgaren treina com seu pai para derrotar Jaspion. Kilmaza continua executando seus planos malignos. Jaspion precisa encontrar logo na quinta criao.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.sub-title: Sou o filho de Satan Goss!

programme.title: Comea a ltima batalha onde Jaspion e Edin enfrentam Satan Goss e Kilmaza.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.sub-title: A unio dos povos da Via Lctea

programme.title: Toha Yamashi discpulo e filho adotivo de Tetsuzan, representante do cl ninja Togakure. Para defender a localizao de Pako, Toha deve enfrentar ninjas de todo o mundo e impedi-los de usar esse grande poder para o mal.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 1 - Pako, a Cpsula Miraculosa Hoshinin Retsuga Tha(Jiraiya)

programme.title: Toha confrontado pelo poderoso Baro Owl, do Imprio dos Ninjas. Ele aprende a histria da inscrio e descobre que sua misso mais difcil do que pensava.

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: Rei Yagyu sequestrada pela Famlia dos Feiticeiro e o resgate exigido a inscrio que revela Pako. Ryu pede ajuda a Toha e os dois traam um plano para resgat-la.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: Uma menina oferece uma estranha droga a Manabu e acaba deixando-o internado no hospital. Rei, Ryu e Toha investigam quem est por trs da venda desta droga e chegam a Kanin Dragon, um especialista em kung-fu.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.sub-title: 11 - A Vingana do Kung-Fu Kan-nin Dragon e o Filho de Kanin Chang Kung Fu Tha(Jiraiya) e Tetsuzan

programme.title: Toha encontra Mimura, um ex-adversrio de Tetsuzan e desertor dos ninjas Kaminin. Mimura est sendo perseguido pelo cl pois no quer cometer os crimes que os Kaminin praticam. Ele ento pede ajuda famlia Yamashi.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 12 - A Promessa do Amor Kaminin Oruha Kazumi e seu pai Kenzuke

programme.title: Mais fugitivos do grupo de Resistncia do Imprio Crisis caminham rumo Terra. Desta vem quem aparece diante de Issamu e Joe Clia, antiga namorada de Joe.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX
programme.sub-title: Entre o Amor e a Amizade

programme.title: Passos inquietantes ecoam no deserto da morte. A Shadow Moon, o inimigo mais poderoso e imortal de todos, voltou. Shadow Moon faz um pacto obscuro com o General Jark.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Masao presencia um acidente envolvendo soldados do Imprio Crisis e eles deixam cair um controle remoto em formato de teclado que possui habilidades ocultas. Pessoas comeam a ter a aparncia modificada uma atrs da outra e Issamu estuda o caso.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: O pai de Hakyo continua agindo de forma estranha... O plano de Gadorian para alimentar a Comunidade Camila, transformando-os em comida para monstros, que envolve o Monstro Kaima Lickpack, ativa a ira de Issamu.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Maribaron volta para Crisis e recebe ordens expressas do Imperador Crisis. Bosgan recebe ordens especficas para capturar noivas cujo signo de Escorpio. Bosgan chama o Guerreiro Kaima Gainakamakil e ambos vo ao encontro de Issamu para confront-lo.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Bosgan, depois te perder para Robo Rider, volta com um trunfo em suas mos: ele recebe uma nova espada chamada "Espada Kaima".
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Naruto: Passado Branco, Ambio Escondida
programme.desc: Naruto finalmente explode! Sua raiva por Haku libera o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. O chakra de Naruto est to intenso que at Kakashi e Zabuza, que esto lutando distncia, percebem. Haku incapaz de fazer algo diante do poder secreto de Naruto.

programme.title: Naruto: As Armas Conhecidas Como Shinobi
programme.desc: Haku pede a Naruto que acabe com ele. Naruto questiona a filosofia de Haku sobre existir apenas para lutar e ganhar. Enquanto isso, a batalha entre Kakashi e Zabuza chega ao clmax. Com a vitria ao alcance, Kakashi libera sua manobra mais devastadora.

programme.title: Naruto: O Demnio Na Neve
programme.desc: Pensando em Haku, Naruto confronta Zabuza com raiva. Sem demonstrar emoes, Zabuza se sente arrasado pela perda de Haku, a nica pessoa em quem confiava no mundo. Naruto aprende que esse tipo de realidade cruel , de fato, o destino de um ninja.

programme.title: Naruto: A Prova Chunin
programme.desc: Naruto e sua equipe voltam Aldeia Oculta da Folha depois da batalha do Pas das Ondas. Mesmo concluindo novas misses, Naruto est insatisfeito com a rotina diria, mas logo ele descobre que estrangeiros esto se juntando na Aldeia da Folha.

programme.title: Street Fighter II - Victory
programme.desc: Depois de perseguir e capturar diversos membros da Ashura, Capito Dorai sente a ira da organizao criminosa.

programme.title: Street Fighter II - Victory
programme.desc: Ken e Ryu perseguem a Ashura at a Tailndia, mas a caada interrompida quando Ryu preso por uma falsa acusao de posse de drogas.

programme.title: Street Fighter II - Victory
programme.desc: Aprisionado, Ryu enfrenta Sagat. Ken finalmente encontra a pessoa que incriminou Ryu com as drogas

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sarada chega na torre onde o pai est, mas acaba se magoando com a atitude inesperada de Sasuke.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sarada fica em choque aps Sakura ser capturada pelo jutsu de Shin. Nem mesmo Naruto, com suas habilidades de rastreamento excepcionais, consegue localiz-la.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Determinada a resgatar Sakura, Sarada vai atrs de Shin junto com Sasuke, Naruto e Cho-Cho.

programme.desc: A Aldeia da Folha fica animada com a chegada dos Kages para o Encontro dos Cinco Kages.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e seus colegas de classe saem em excurso para a Aldeia da Nvoa, no Pas da gua.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Verdadeiro Rosto De Sasori
programme.desc: Vovchiyo e sakura conseguem expor sasori, que incrivelmente no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos.chiyo fica ainda mais chocada com o segundo boneco que sasori revela.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades Secretas De Chiyo
programme.desc: Sakura pega pelas tticas de sasori e fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno. Mas ela usa uma papel bomba para se livrar da fumaavenenosa. Ela resolver se arriscar a capturar sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre o paradeiro de orochimaru.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pai E Me
programme.desc: A maior vantagem dos bonecos criados de humanos que ele pode assumir o comando do jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo.consequentemente, o boneco do terceiro kazekage tem ahabilidade especial de converter chakra em poder magntico.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terceiro Kazekage
programme.desc: Sakura revida oataque da areia de ferro do boneco do terceiro kazekage com uma fora sobre-humana. Ela aprendeu com tsunade que a habilidade mais importante de um mdico ninja se evadir um ataque.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto secreto que ela tomou. Sakura explica a uma surpresa vov chiyo que esse antdoto converte o veneno em protena e funciona durante mais ou menos trs minutos.
programme.sub-title: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte

programme.title: Naruto: Identifique-Se : Novos E Poderosos Rivais
programme.desc: Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura so escolhidos para fazer a Prova Chunin. Iruka se ope participao dos trs, pois os considera muito novos e inexperientes para o desafio. Kakashi, porm, acredita que eles cresceram e esto mais prontos do que nunca.

programme.title: Naruto: O Desafio Chunin:Rock Lee Contra Sasuke
programme.desc: Enquanto Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura se preparam para a prova, um ninja chamado Rock Lee aparece. Lee quer lutar contra Sasuke, que possui o poder do cl Uchiha. Sasuke aceita o desafio de Lee, mas fica s na defesa devido aos ataques rpidos desse oponente.
programme.sub-title: O Desafio Chunin:Rock Lee Contra Sasuke

programme.sub-title: A Batalha Genin, Os Nove Novatos Se Enfrentam

programme.title: Naruto: Liguem Os Motores A Prova Chunin Comea
programme.desc: Naruto e sua equipe iniciam a primeira prova. O examinador Ibiki Morino, um jonin (ninja de alto nvel) notrio e perito em interrograo. Sasuke e Sakura esto preocupados, pois se Naruto responder tudo errado, eles tambm falharo.
programme.sub-title: Liguem Os Motores A Prova Chunin Comea

programme.title: Naruto: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada
programme.desc: A parte mais difcil da prova comea na pergunta 10. Antes dos ninjas escutarem a pergunta, Ibiki coloca uma regra injusta para o problema: quem responder errado ser reprovado e no ter o direito de fazer qualquer Prova Chunin no futuro.
programme.sub-title: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades Secretas De Chiyo

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pai E Me
programme.desc: A maior vantagem dos bonecos criados de humanos que ele pode assumir o comando do jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo.consequentemente, o boneco do terceiro kazekage tem ahabilidade especial de converter chakra em poder magntico.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terceiro Kazekage

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto secreto que ela tomou. Sakura explica a uma surpresa vov chiyo que esse antdoto converte o veneno em protena e funciona durante mais ou menos trs minutos.
programme.sub-title: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!
programme.desc: Sakura e vov chiyo esto enfrentando uma batalha feroz contra sasori, onde ele pode se tornar um boneco humano. Elas derrotam sasori dentro do prazo, mas ele acaba revivendo.
programme.sub-title: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Sonho Impossvel
programme.desc: Embora tenha sido envenenada, vov chiyo usa o ltimoantdoto em sakura. Zombando da terna cena entre vov chiyo e sakura, sasori tenta por fim vida de vov chiyo. Mas vov chiyo revida e derrota sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Feras Ressuscitadas!
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta desesperada de sakura e vov chiyo, enquanto enfrentam suas cpias.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kakashi Iluminado
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar naruto com a vov chiyo, que est sofrendo com o veneno. Os membros da equipe guy correm paraajudar a equipe kakashi. Enquanto isso, com as preparaes completas, kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esttica De Um Momento
programme.desc: Na Aldeia da Folha, a equipe de Konohamaru foi promovida a Genin e agora est sob a superviso de Ebisu. Um Naruto mais velho chega aldeia aps uma longa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki est de volta!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Legado
programme.desc: Jiraiya traz notcias altamente secretas de que os Akatsuki entraram em ao. Naruto e Sakura propem a Kakashi um desafio de sobrevivncia. Na Aldeia da Areia, Gaara o Kazekage agora, e membros da Akatsuki se infiltram na aldeia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage
programme.desc: As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura foram Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lana um jutsu aps outro. Sakura usa tcnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki comea uma operao secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo
programme.desc: Gaara percebe a presena de Deidara e comea uma batalha area na areia. O jonin da areia Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrvel poder de Kakashi. A dupla d seu golpe final.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi
programme.desc: Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora so todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada
programme.desc: Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de Deidara, Gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo. A aldeia salva a um enorme custo. Gaara fica vulnervel. As tentativas de seus companheiros so inteis, e Gaara acaba caindo nas mos de Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso
programme.desc: Gaara arrastado para longe por Deidara. Kankuro sai com um peloto para salvar Gaara, mas os Akatsuki haviam instalado armadilhas engenhosas. Determinado, Kankuro encontra sozinho os Akatsuki. A nova equipe de Naruto comemora sua primeira misso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo
programme.desc: Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi
programme.desc: Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vov Chiyo, perita em veneno, chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara comeam o jutsu de selamento e os nove drages fantasmas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta
programme.desc: Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mos firmes. Vov Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua prpria aprendiz e pela determinao de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informaes sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um co de caa ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a histria das bestas de cauda.
programme.sub-title: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura
programme.desc: Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Spaceballs, (1987, Comedy)

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: V/H/S, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: This is a point-of-view, found-footage horror film from the America's top genre filmmakers. A group of misfits are hired to burglarize a house and acquire a rare tape. They are confronted with a dead body, old televisions and a supply of cryptic footage.

programme.title: V/H/S/2, (2013, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: From the innovative minds that brought you last year's V/H/S comes V/H/S/2, an all-new anthology of dread, madness, and gore.

programme.title: V/H/S: Viral, (2015, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: A deranged truck driver has received the audience of many teens. These teens video with cameras and cell phones to catch the next viral video. However, they are the stars of the next big viral video - one where they face their own horrifying deaths.

programme.title: Hell House LLC., (2016, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Five years after an unexplained malfunction causes the death of 15 tour-goers and staff on the opening night of a Halloween haunted house tour, a documentary crew travels back to the scene of the tragedy to find out what really happened.

programme.title: Found, (2012, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A horror-obsessed boy discovers his older brother is a serial killer.

programme.title: Wolf Creek, (2005, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Stranded backpackers in remote Australia fall prey to a murderous bushman who offers to fix their car, then takes them captive.

programme.title: Eden Lake, (2008, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A young couple travels to a remote lake quarry in England, only to fend off a group of teenage hoods.

programme.title: No One Lives, (2013, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: The tables unexpectedly turn when a ruthless gang inadvertently kidnaps a seasoned killer who is determined that no one lives. Starring Luke Evans, Adelaide Clemens, and Brodus Clay.

programme.title: Rain Man, (1988, Drama)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as an idealistic young wheeler-dealer whose life is changed forever when he discovers he has an autistic savant older brother (Dustin Hoffman, in a Best Actor Oscar-winning performance).

programme.title: Terms of Endearment, (1983, Drama)
programme.desc: Terms of Endearment dazzled critics and audiences alike with its believable, insightful story of two captivating people, mother and daughter, unforgettably played by Shirley MacLaine and Debra Winger.

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman, (1982, Drama)
programme.desc: Loner Zack Mayo (Richard Gere) enters Officer Candidate School to become a Navy pilot and in thirteen torturous weeks, he learns the importance of discipline, love, and friendship.

programme.title: American Gigolo, (1980, Thriller)
programme.desc: Julian Kay has it all: the Mercedes, the clothes, access to Beverly Hills' swankiest establishments, and a stable of rich, female clients. But it all falls apart after he does a favor for his former pimp and the trick turns up dead a short while later.

programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Beowulf, (2007, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After Beowulf, the mightiest warrior of all, destroyes the overpowering demon Grendel, he incurs wrath of the beast's mother to seek out revenge.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Naruto and his two squadmates have always wanted to see what Kakashi looks like under his mask. The three do whatever they can to reveal his whole face.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura are to protect the runners in a race being held during the Todoroki Shrine's ceremonial ritual held every four years.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The chief retainers think that Idate has made a farce of their great traditional festival. Jirocho believes that Idate has fled with some plan in mind.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and his squad manage to catch up to Idate, only to find him hurt and unconscious with Aoi nearby.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Despite interference from Aoi, Idate continues his run. Idate still trusts no one, and its revealed that during the Chunin Exams, Idates older brother was the proctor who posed the tenth question.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Boss Jirocho waits, confident that Idate will win. But Aoi, the ninja sent by the Wagarashi clan, stands in the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru is promoted to chunin, and he and his squadmates celebrate at a BBQ restaurant. In the hospital, Lee decides to undergo a dangerous surgery to repair his body so that he can remain a ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Sasuke release their ultimate weapons against each other, and just in time, Kakashi arrives to stop the fight.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four, Kidomaru, Sakon, Jirobo and Tayuya, suddenly appear before Sasuke. Sakura is concerned about the Curse Mark placed on Sasuke by Orochimaru
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sakuras pleas fall on deaf ears, and Sasuke leaves Hidden Leaf Village. When Tsunade learns of this, she summons Shikamaru to lead his first mission as a chunin.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four race toward Orochimarus lair with Sasuke in hand. Theyre discovered and challenged by the jonin Genma and Raido
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are trapped in Jirobos Earth Dome Prison. They try to pound their way out, but the walls regenerate each time.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After they are freed from the Earth Dome Prison, Shikamaru and the others take off after the remaining Sound while Choji stays behind.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After Choji takes the yellow pill it looks as if he may win the battle, until Jirobo transforms into Second State, giving him immense power.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Assuming that the Leaf squad could never get past Jirobo, the remaining Sound ninja dont bother to lay traps along the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Neji takes on Kidomaru while the others continue their pursuit of Sasuke and the remaining Sound ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kidomaru changes tactics and creates a bow and arrow to attack Nejis blind spot.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Shikamaru, Kiba and Akamaru are in hot pursuit of Sasuke and the Sound ninja. Naruto and Kiba are upset that they have been unable to catch up and decide to try a surprise attack at night.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akamaru sets explosives in the trees to trap Sakon. But an incensed Sakon turns the tables, and the explosives end up sending Kiba, Akamaru and Sakon off a cliff.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru is determined to stop Tayuya, but she uses her Summoning Jutsu to call forth three giants. Meanwhile, on the plains, the battle between Kimimaro and Naruto is about to begin.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Ukon, who is able to infiltrate the bodies of others, enters Kibas body and tries to merge with his cells.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: An injured Kiba and Akamaru barely escape from Sakon and Ukon. Naruto is locked in battle with Kimimaro
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru succeeds in trapping Tayuya with his Shadow Possession Jutsu. But Tayuya moves to her Second State and fights back with enormous strength.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With Rock Lee there to take on Kimimaro, Naruto is free to chase after Sasuke, who has awakened.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru, Kiba and Lee are at the limits of their strength when Gaara, Temari and Kankuro appear to assist their Leaf allies.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kimimaro realizes that close combat is impossible against Gaaras wall of sand, so he moves further away for a long-distance attack.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kimimaro succeeds in shattering Gaaras protective sand shield and attacks Gaara. Naruto finally catches up to Sasuke
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With the Curse Mark covering half his body, Sasuke is no longer the Sasuke of old. Naruto charges at this new Sasuke who has turned his back on his closest comrades.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto tries desperately to change Sasukes mind, but Sasuke is determined to go to Orochimaru. He tells Naruto that in order to surpass his brother, Itachi, power and hatred are necessary.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is brought down by Sasukes Fire Style: Fireball Jutsu. It is a jutsu passed down through generations of the Uchiha family
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sasuke quietly watches as Naruto sinks deeper in the water. He recalls the past when the Uchiha clan was cruelly slaughtered.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kakashi uses his Summoning Jutsu and sends ninja dogs to track Naruto and Sasuke. With his newfound strength, Sasuke is serious about bringing down Naruto
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto releases his Nine-Tail chakra and sends Sasuke flying. Sasuke counters with his Fire Style Jutsu, but Naruto extinguishes the flames easily.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: Killing Them Softly, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: During the economic turmoil of 2008, Jackie Cogan (Brad Pitt), an enforcer, is hired to restore order after three idiots rob a mob-protected poker game.

programme.title: Thief, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Michael Mann directs this stylishly photographed action-packed drama that stars James Caan as a master safe cracker who is planning his last heist for the sake of a woman (Tuesday Weld).

programme.title: Original Gangstas, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: A fast-paced Action-Thriller about adults living in a crime-ridden area. They are tired of being bullied, and take matters into their own hands to rid the town of the criminals.

programme.title: Brawl in Cell Block 99, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: When Bradley (Vince Vaughn) is sent to prison, he is forced to commit acts of violence that turn the place into a savage battleground.

programme.title: State of Grace, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: In this neo-noir crime film, an undercover cop (Sean Penn) comes back to his old neighborhood in New York City's Hell's Kitchen to bring down the Irish Mafia, which is now led by two of his childhood friends (Gary Oldman and Ed Harris).

programme.title: Suicide Kings, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: A group of youngsters kidnap a respected Mafia figure.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate, (1962, Thriller)
programme.desc: Frank Sinatra, Laurence Harvey, Janet Leigh, and Angela Lansbury headline an all-star cast in this daring thriller rife with political intrigue, mental manipulation, and a diabolical plot that may lead to the highest levels of the government.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: As the entire nation watches the presidential campaign hurtle towards Election Day, one soldier races to uncover the conspiracy behind it - a conspiracy that seeks to destroy democracy itself.

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: Death Wish, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: When his wife (Elisabeth Shue) and daughter (Camila Morrone) are savagely assaulted, an enraged doctor (Bruce Willis) seeks his own justice, becoming part deadly avenger and part guardian angel in director Eli Roth's reinvention of the classic!

programme.title: The Mechanic, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: In a role that powered him to stardom, Charles Bronson is an underworld executioner who turns murder into an art form in this ultimate crime chiller.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, Jason Statham is a mechanican elite assassin with a strict code and unique talent for cleanly eliminating targets. Simon West (CON AIR) directs this hit remake of the 1972 Charles Bronson movie.

programme.title: Let The Right One In, (2008, Foreign Horror)
programme.desc: Lonely, 12-year-old Oskar is bullied by his classmates. A new friendship develops when Eli, a pale young girl who only comes out at night, moves in next door. Coinciding with her arrival is a series of inexplicable disappearances and murders.

programme.title: Let Me In, (2011, Vampires)
programme.desc: Owen, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Abby (Chlo Grace Moretz of KICK-ASS), a beautiful but peculiar girl who turns out to be a vampire.

programme.title: Rollerball, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan stars as a rollerball champ in this fast-hitting, action- packed glimpse of a future where a brutal, no-holds-barred sport takes the place of war, and murder is just part of the game.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Swingers, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Chasing Amy, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Cult comic-book artist Holden falls head-over-heals with fellow artist Alyssa, but for that love to live, he'll need to contend with his disapproving best friend Banky, her sexuality, and his own misgivings about himself in this Kevin Smith classic.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Swingers, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Chasing Amy, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Cult comic-book artist Holden falls head-over-heals with fellow artist Alyssa, but for that love to live, he'll need to contend with his disapproving best friend Banky, her sexuality, and his own misgivings about himself in this Kevin Smith classic.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gang hijacks a subway train and threaten to kill the hostages one by one until their demands are met. Forced to stall, transit chief Lt. Garber (Walter Matthau) must outmaneuver one of the craftiest and cruelest screen villains (Robert Shaw) ever.

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.title: Dillinger, (1973, Drama)
programme.desc: An account of the notorious gangster, John Dillinger, from midway through his bank-robbing career up until his final shootout outside the Biograph Theatre.

programme.title: The Lady In Red, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: A farm girl (Pamela Sue Martin) turns to guns, sin and bathtub gin with gangster John Dillinger (Robert Conrad).

programme.title: Boxcar Bertha, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: Set in the Depression era of the 1930s, a young woman and three men rob trains and plan a kidnapping. The men are caught and the woman becomes a prostitute. Based on "Sister of the Road" by Boxcar Bertha Thomson as told to Ben L. Reitman.

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.title: The Last Tycoon, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: F. Scott Fitzgerald's fascinating tale of studio politics in early Hollywood is breathtakingly brought to the screen by director Elia Kazan and screenwriter Harold Pinter.

programme.title: The Private Life Of Sherlock Holmes, (1970, Thriller)
programme.desc: When a beautiful woman claims that her husband has disappeared, the investigation takes Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson to Scotland, where they uncover a plot involving a clandestine society, Her Majesty's Secret Service... and the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it's a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing Life Points equals losing your memories.
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 1: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Mai loses more memories under Marik's relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends' never-ending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 2: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik's The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she's unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities. Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 3: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City finals, Kaiba's mystery opponent is Ishizu. With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play.
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 1: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Ishizu, using the magic of her Millennium Necklace, has already seen the outcome of the duel: she will defeat Kaiba with sacrifice's blast! How can Kaiba win when it's predestined that he will lose? Kaiba must change the future!
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 2: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Marik's evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline: How did Marik transform from a kind child into a power-hungry tyrant out for world domination? Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With their previous pact broken, Bakura duels Marik for the right to control the Millennium Rod and Millennium Ring, with the loser being trapped inside the Shadow Realm forever. To tip the odds, Bakura gains an unexpected ally another Marik?
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 1: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura and good Marik summon The Winged Dragon of Ra, ready to blast and banish evil Marik into the Shadow Realm. But The Winged Dragon of Ra has more than one special ability, and evil Marik knows how to use them all.
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 2: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's blimp is hijacked by a mysterious boy named Noah and his henchmen - five familiar foes from Yugi and Kaiba's past who are out for revenge!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first to duel under the all-new Deck Master System is Yugi against Big 1 Gansley's Deepsea Warrior! Can Yugi master the complex new rules, or will the rules master him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Yugi struggles to make heads or tails of the Deck Master System, Big 1 uses his Deck Master ability to send all of Yugi's attacks right back! How can Yugi defeat an opponent when his attacks take away his own life points?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's running out of life points, but can his cute little Deck Master Kuriboh unleash his furry fury to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Prepare for a feathered fight when Ta squares off against Big 2 Crump's Nightmare Penguin where the loser will be trapped forever in a block of ice!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Ta's body turns more and more into a giant popsicle, can she keep her brain from freezing to find a way to melt Big 2's strategy? Or will Big 2's penguin horde waddle all over her?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the judicial jerk Big 3 Johnson who takes the Deck Master form of Judge Man! How can Joey defeat a foe who can destroy Joey's monsters at will?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Just when Joey seems to gain the upper hand, he hits the longest streak of bad luck in the history of mankind! Has Joey's fortunes finally run out, or is a crooked judge ignoring the rules of the law?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 4 Nezbitt challenges Duke, Tristan, and Serenity for the right to gain control of three bodies at once! Will Serenity's errors cost her team the ultimate price when Tristan and Duke can't cover for her mistakes?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: One down, two to go! With the loss of Tristan, Serenity is heartbroken. Can she pull herself together and remember the lessons Tristan taught her to turn the duel around?

programme.title: Corazon's double-dealing with the Navy raises suspicions both with Doflamingo and Law. But all that is secondary as Corazon finally has a chance to grab the Op-Op Fruit during a staged handoff arranged by the Government.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Time is Ticking Down! Seize the Op-Op Fruit!

programme.title: The Op-Op Fruit is in Corazon's hands! But the price he paid to get it might be too high... When Law goes for help, unfortunate coincidences intervene and leave the two vulnerable! Meanwhile, Doflamingo and his clan finally land at Minion Island.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Moment of Resolution! Corazon's Farewell Smile!

programme.title: Doflamingo & his Family begin to zero in on Corazon and Law's whereabouts, but Corazon has a plan to hide Law long enough to let him escape, even if that means sacrificing his own life. A chain of lucky coincidences allows the plan to be set into motion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Advance, Law! The Kindhearted Man's Final Fight!

programme.title: Violet runs down the status of the open battles raging in Dressrosa - the Straw Hats, the Tontattas, the executives of the Doflamingo Family - all of them clash around the island, but it's Law's revelation to Doflamingo that moves the action forward!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Be Free! Law's Injection Shot Blasts!

programme.title: Luffy continues to battle Fake-mingo, but keeps accidentally battling Bellamy instead. Meanwhile the tide of battle turns against Law as painful scars from the past resurface. And Zoro gets unexpected help in his battle with Pica.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Intense Battle! Law vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Bellamy escapes Doflamingo's control, but it might be too late. His long history with Doflamingo unfolds and leads to an inglorious end. Meanwhile, Hajrudin has been beaten down, but a fire still burns in him to pay back the favor he owes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle Against the Executives! Proud Hajrudin!

programme.title: Lao G and Don Chinjao duke it out as each brings their most devastating attacks to the battle. But a misunderstanding caused by Baby 5 has Sai and Don Chinjao distracted - are they distracted enough for Lao G to gain the upper hand?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle of Love! The New Leader Sai vs. Baby 5!

programme.title: Law is at the whim of Doflamingo and Trebol, while Luffy still has to deal with Bellamy, who fights to keep his honor even after being released by Doflamingo! Meanwhile, Gladius is about to detonate the ground around Cavendish and Bartolomeo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Man's Pride! Bellamy's Last Charge!

programme.title: A mysterious force that resembles Cavendish menaces the battlefield - but while it appears to help Bartolomeo and the others at first, it sets its sights on Robin! Meanwhile, the deeply-wounded Ideo sees Dellinger's horrible true nature!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Strong Wind and a Surge! Hakuba vs. Dellinger!

programme.title: Bartolomeo is in a neck-and-neck battle against Gladius to save Robin, and is faced with an impossible dilemma. With all his options leading to their defeat, can his cunning ploy save the day? Meanwhile, Robin is face to face with Cavendish.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Princess Mansherry's amazing power - to heal living beings completely - is in the hands of the Donquixote executive. If she is able to heal all the executives who've gone down in battle - the Straw Hats and their allies stand no chance!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Seor Pink and Franky continue their knock-down, drag-out, manly fight. As both of them are pushed to their limits, we learn Seor's tragic past! Meanwhile, Princess Mansherry's rescue hits a snag as she stubbornly refuses to leave!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Manly Duel! Seor's Elegy of Love!

programme.title: Franky and Seor Pink end their harrowing duel in a manly way - but victory knocks the wind out of even the winner's sails! Meanwhile, Diamante and Kyros struggle desperately on the Sunflower Field, each demonstrating their extreme prowess.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Stardust of Death! Diamante's Storm of Vicious Attacks!

programme.title: Kyros, unbowed by Diamante's vicious attacks, fights back with the anger and retribution of all of Dressrosa in order to fulfill his promise to protect Rebecca. If he is successful, only a few executives will remain.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Pica loses his temper and turns his full wrath against King Riku, whom he hopes to destroy, ending the revolution against Doflamingo. Meanwhile, Zoro, who has been distracted by Pica and drawn far from the battle, has to hatch a plan to save the king!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Moving Across the Ground! The Giant Statue Pica's Surprise Maneuver!

programme.title: With the lives of King Riku, Usopp, and the others on the old King's Plateau in the balance, Zoro must dig deep and discover a powerful technique to counter Pica's near-unstoppable onslaught. Meanwhile, King Riku ponders what it means to be a good king.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle in Midair! Zoro's New Special Secret Technique Blasts!

programme.title: Zoro finishes off Pica, and those below his crumbling body rush to find shelter. Meanwhile, the Tontattas finish up demolishing the SMILE Factory, and Luffy's hand is forced in his duel with Bellamy!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Taking down Bellamy only enrages Luffy in his fight against Doflamingo, his anger multiplying when he finds Law's lifeless body! Meanwhile, Doflamingo takes the next step to end the game he started, which will endanger everybody in Dressrosa!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Birdcage draws tighter and tighter around Dressrosa, threatening to destroy all life on the island kingdom! Meanwhile, Doflamingo stands down Luffy for a final confrontation, but a surprising twist shocks everyone on the top of the Royal Palace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Blade of Tenacity! The Gamma Knife Counterattack!

programme.title: Law's attack proves powerful - but Doflamingo's power has depths which he and Luffy haven't bargained for. When Doflamingo makes his counterattack, Luffy stares him down with an amazing power.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Collision of Haki! Luffy vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Trebol's wrath is fully inflamed as Law summons enough energy to speak, denouncing the Doflamingo Family executives as pawns in Doflamingo's game. But Law gathers enough energy to do more than just speak out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unassailable! The Stunning Secret of Trebol!

programme.title: Cavendish has to make a difficult decision when the severely wounded Law begs him to be left behind. Meanwhile, seeing even his Second Gear or Third Gear attacks aren't working against Doflamingo, Luffy decides to use his ultimate technique!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Erupts! I Will Take Everything upon Myself!

programme.title: Luffy and Doflamingo duke it out while the Birdcage tightens its grip on Dressrosa! Zoro sets off with a plan to stop it from slicing apart the country, while Luffy's Fourth Gear proves quite potent against Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Birdcage continues its merciless constriction, sending the residents of Dressrosa fleeing towards the center of the island, while King Riku calls out to his people: Survive long enough for Luffy to vanquish the last of the royal family.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Fourth Gear gives Luffy the power he needs to head off Doflamingo at every strike! But the energy required to keep Fourth Gear going starts to take a toll on Luffy. Will he have enough left to finish the job?
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Bounce-man's power has drained Luffy, leaving him in need of a rest before he can reuse his Haki, but luckily the gladiators from the Colosseum have come around and are focusing on taking down Doflamingo! Sabo steps in at a crucial moment.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Flame Dragon King! Protect Luffy's Life!

programme.title: With Luffy and so many of the Straw Hats' allies incapacitated, victory seems inevitable for Doflamingo - but the compassion of Mansherry may be enough to turn the tide and renew their hope - to stop the Birdcage!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: With just over a minute to spare, everyone in Dressrosa turns their efforts towards slowing down the Birdcage as it squeezes the life out of the country! Meanwhile, Viola seeks Doflamingo out herself, for a shocking confrontation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: As Long as We Breathe! Stop the Deadly Birdcage!

programme.title: Only a bit more time remains before Luffy returns to the scene! But as time slips by, those who had been roused by Princess Mansherry's powers begin to falter! Meanwhile, Rebecca, under the control of Doflamingo, is about to attack Viola!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dead or Alive! A Fateful Countdown!

programme.title: Luffy regains enough Haki to face off against Doflamingo, but his health is still poor. With the Birdcage closing in, is there a technique left in his repertoire that is strong enough to take down Doflamingo?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Attack on a Celestial! Luffy's King Kong Gun of Anger!

programme.title: With Doflamingo thoroughly quashed and the Birdcage collapsing, the people of Dressrosa shed tears of joy remembering the hardships they've endured, and the actions taken by Luffy and the others to free them.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Jesus Burgess of the Blackbeard Pirates tries to agitate Sabo, mocking Ace's final words in order to unsettle him enough that he can try to steal the Flare-Flare Fruit! Meanwhile, people of Dressrosa beg King Riku to resume the crown.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unheard-of! Admiral Fujitoras Surprising Decision!

programme.title: Repercussions of Doflamingo's defeat reverberate around the world! Fujitora's actions put the Navy in a tight spot, and the "Worst Generation" beings to stir into action!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sending a Shock Wave! The Worst Generation Goes Into Action!

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Vampires)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: Tank Girl, (1995, Adventure)
programme.desc: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic thriller, a mega-villain controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: Hackers, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: A neophyte hacker becomes the target of the FBI after he unknowingly taps into a high-tech embezzling scheme which could cause a horrific environmental disaster in this suspenseful drama.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Last Train From Gun Hill, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: Screen giants Kirk Douglas and Anthony Quinn star in this taut Western thriller directed by acclaimed filmmaker John Sturges (Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, The Great Escape).

programme.title: Warlock, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: An ex-outlaw (Richard Widmark) divides and challenges a quick-draw lawman (Henry Fonda) and his sidekick (Anthony Quinn).

programme.title: Sam Whiskey, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Welcome to America's Wild - and very wacky - West! Burt Reynolds, Clint Walker, Ossie Davis and Angie Dickinson star in this tongue-in-cheek tale of love, lust and larceny as an amiable con-artist is hire by a sexy widow to break into the U.S. Mint.

programme.title: Billy Two Hats, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: Archie (Gregory Peck) and his partner, Billy (Desi Arnaz, Jr.) are bandits by trade, staging daring robberies throughout the American frontier. But when their latest heist takes a deadly turn, they are pursued by a ruthless marshal (Jack Warden).

programme.title: Last Of The Pony Riders, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry tries to set up a stage line to carry government mail. Schemers try to get the government assignment for their own stage line, and plan to discredit the Pony Express by causing accidents.

programme.title: On Top Of Old Smoky, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry, who is mistaken for a Texas Ranger, helps the owner of a toll road, while she is being pressured by bad characters to relinquish her property, which contains valuable mica deposits.

programme.title: Union Bound, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: Sargent Hoover went to war to preserve the Union. After being captured and sent to a prisoner of war camp, he understood what it was to be kept against his will. Together with a friend he escaped and aided by slaves made it to freedom.

programme.title: Cast A Long Shadow, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: Audie Murphy plays Matt, a troubled saddle tramp with a penchant for drinking. When he inherits a massive ranch, it leads him back into the arms of an old flame (Terry Moore), as well as into the fists some old rivals who would rather see him dead.

programme.title: From Noon Till Three, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson plays Graham Dorsey, a bank robber who, through a series of twists and turns finds himself the object of national adoration. A beautiful widow, Amanda Starbuck (Jill Ireland) is responsible for creating this myth.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: From three-time Oscar-winning director Steven Spielberg, Catch Me If You Can follows Frank W. Abagnale, Jr. as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday!

programme.title: The Lovely Bones, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: Stranger Than Fiction, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: From three-time Oscar-winning director Steven Spielberg, Catch Me If You Can follows Frank W. Abagnale, Jr. as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday!

programme.title: The Lovely Bones, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: Stranger Than Fiction, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.
