programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: An old woman named Mayako lives alone in a mansion. Mayako is very distrustful of strangers, believing they are after her wealth and fortune.
programme.sub-title: The Secret Mansion: A Menu of Love for You

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Reports of Pegasus attacking the town cause Usagi and the other Sailor Guardians to have doubts about whether Pegasus can be trusted or not.
programme.sub-title: Believe in Pegasus: The Four Guardians' Super Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying their summer vacation by the beach. Shingo is acting as their bodyguardespecially for Ami, whom he has a crush on.
programme.sub-title: Shining Summer Days: Ami Under the Sea-Breeze

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa see an ad for a free ballet lesson and sign up. As they practice, Fishs Eye draws the class's attention with his dancing skills.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa meet a woman named Rubina who follows them. Rubina is a princess who snuck out to experience life outside of her royal duties.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls attend the school festival. Makoto is asked to dance by a handsome man, who is actually Tiger's Eye in disguise.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Fish's Eye goes after Mamoru. But Mamoru seems to show no interest in being with anyone besides Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Shadow of Evil: The Trio's Last Chance

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Zirconia threatens the Amazon Trio that if they dont capture Pegasus by the next new moon, the magic making them human will wear off.
programme.sub-title: Mirrors of Dreams: The Amazon's Last Stage

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends go to see a show at the Dead Moon Circus. But Momo starts acting peculiar and leaves, causing Chibi-Usa to become worried.
programme.sub-title: The Amazoness: Nightmare from Behind the Mirrors

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami falls in love with a melody she finds online. She works on lyrics that match the melody and also goes to meet the composer, Toshiyuki Nishino.
programme.sub-title: True Power Explodes: Ami's Melody of the Heart

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei becomes famous after posing for a magazine. A girl named Nanako, expresses her desire to study under Rei so that she can become just like her.
programme.sub-title: Flames of Passion: Mars's Raging Super Attack

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa go to the dentist to get their cavities treated. The dental clinic is actually a trap set up by Palla-Palla to find Pegasus.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako and Makoto compete to win the heart of Honjo, a young principal. But their rivalry starts to put a strain on their friendship.
programme.sub-title: Clash of Dreams: Minako and Makoto's Broken Friendship

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usas school is having a sports day. However, one of its main events is jumping over the vaulting box, which Chibi-Usa is not very good at.
programme.sub-title: Overcome Your Fear: The Jump to Freedom

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa and Usagi befriend a young painter named Kamoi at the park. Kamoi is visited by Cere-Cere, who asks the man to paint a portrait of her.
programme.sub-title: Don't Lose Sight of Your Dreams: The Mirror of Truth

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa is curious to know why Pegasus is reluctant to tell her where he came from. When she confronts Pegasus with the question, he disappears.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Palla-Pall turns Sailor Chibi Moon into an adult and Sailor Moon into a child. Chibi-Usa turns into shock when Pegasus can no longer hear her.
programme.sub-title: Pegasus's Secret: The Boy Who Protects the Dream World

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls begin to suspect that Chibi-Usa is in love. Eager to know who the boy is, they try to get Chibi-Usa to talk, but with little success.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends help set up the stage for the Coming of Age Day ceremony. They befriend four girls who are actually the Amazoness Quartet.
programme.sub-title: Dream to be an Adult: The Amazoness' Confusion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Strange spider webs begin to appear all across the Juban District. The girls notice that these webs are all originating from the Dead Moon Circus.
programme.sub-title: Terror in Motion: The Dark Queen's Evil Hand

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nehelenia sets her plan in motion by starting a solar eclipse that will leave the world in eternal darkness.
programme.sub-title: The Source of Darkness: Dead Moon Circus

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Dead Moon discovers that Sailor Chibi Moon was hiding Pegasus and captures her. Sailor Chibi Moon learns the history behind the Dead Moon's queen.
programme.sub-title: Labyrinth of Mirrors: Chibi Moon Captured

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nehelenia demands that Helios give up the Golden Crystal in exchange for Sailor Chibi Moon. The Sailor Guardians are struggling to defeat Zirconia.
programme.sub-title: The Golden Crystal Appears: Nehalennia's Magic

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nehelenia regains her full power and proceeds to put the world into an eternal slumber.Sailor Moon tries to activate the power of the Golden Crystal.
programme.sub-title: When the Crystal Shines: The Beautiful Power of Dreams

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Golden Crystals power defeats Nehelenia, pushing her back into the abyss. Nehelenia tries to take Sailor Chibi Moon with her.
programme.sub-title: Dreams Forever: Fill the Heavens with Light

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends start their new lives as high school girls. Nehalennia breaks out of her prison to seek revenge against the Sailor Guardians.
programme.sub-title: The Flower of Nightmares Scatters: The Queen of Darkness Returns

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Hotaru starts to age at an accelerated rate, from a baby to a young girl within days. She warns of coming danger that will soon befall Sailor Moon.
programme.sub-title: Saturn Awakens: The Ten Sailor Guardians Unite

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The city is being plagued by a strange illness that causes people to become obsessed with staring into the mirror for hours, even days.
programme.sub-title: The Cursed Mirror: Mamoru Caught in a Nightmare

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon is left devastated after seeing Mamoru get abducted To make matters worse, Nehalennias action is starting to cause a time paradox.
programme.sub-title: Night of Destiny: The Sailor Guardians' Ordeals

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon runs off to save Mamoru from Nehalennia. The rest of the Sailor Guardians try to go after her, but they fall victim to Nehalennias traps.
programme.sub-title: For Love: The Endless Battle in the Dark World

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Chibi Moon and Sailor Saturn make it to Nehalennias palace, where Mamoru is being held prisoner. The two Guardians are unable to free him.
programme.sub-title: Moon Power of Love: The Nightmare Ends

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru tells Usagi that hes accepted an offer to study abroad in the U.S., which will force them to have a long-distance relationship.
programme.sub-title: Farewells and Encounters: The Transitioning Stars of Destiny

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi runs into Seiya and is annoyed by his cocky attitude. The next day, Seiya and the rest of Three Lights have transferred to her school.
programme.sub-title: A School Storm: The Transfer Students Are Idols

programme.title: Semper Fi, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Cal is a dedicated cop who also serves as a sergeant in the Marine Corps Reserve. When his reckless half brother lands in jail for accidentally killing a man, Cal and his buddies hatch a plan to break him out of prison -- no matter what the cost.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Ten years after his wife and child die in a home invasion, a man carries out an elaborate plot against the prosecutor who cut a deal with one of the killers.

programme.title: Detective Knight: Rogue, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Mask-wearing robbers critically wound Detective James Knight's partner during a shootout. As Knight pursues the bandits from Los Angeles to New York, his dark past collides with his present case, threatening to tear his world apart.

programme.title: Detective Knight: Redemption, (1970, Entertainment)

programme.sub-title: A Aliana Dos Shinobi Da Areia Com A Folha
programme.desc: Naruto: A Aliana Dos Shinobi Da Areia Com A Folha - T01E217

programme.title: 2020. Os oponentes de Gaara armam uma armadilha. Gaara acaba sendo preso pelo jutsu secreto Formao de Escala Reversa e sua areia completamente selada. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: A Areia Selada:O Contra-Ataque! - T01E218

programme.title: 2020. Gaara e Naruto encurralam Hoko, o ltimo dos quatro celestiais, num vale. Eles descobrem que o objetivo deles era roubar o chacra de Shukaku, o Esprito da Areia, e assim ter o poder para desafiar as Cinco Grandes Naes. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: A Derradeira Arma Renasce - T01E219

programme.title: 2020. Gaara se transforma em Shukaku, o Esprito da Areia, e obtm uma vitria impressionante. Depois da batalha, alguns descobrem novos caminhos para seguir, e Naruto decide ser ainda mais forte ao ir numa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: A Partida - T01E220

programme.title: 2020. Bem-vindo Aldeia Oculta da folha, onde ninjas assassinos percorrem a terra, e o travesso Naruto Uzumaki apronta encrenca aonde for. Ao roubar o antigo pergaminho do selo, ele libera um poder nico raramente visto em um garoto de 12 anos! Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Naruto Uzumaki Chegando! - T01E01

programme.title: 2020. Naruto finalmente se forma na Academia Ninja e diz que sabe tudo. Bom, pelo menos isso que ele conta para Konohamaru, o neto tampinha do lder da aldeia. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Meu Nome Konohamaru - T01E02

programme.title: 2020. Para se tornar um ninja, Naruto precisa formar uma equipe com seus colegas, a bela Sakura e o srio Sasuke, que tm uma coisa em comum: o dio que sentem por Naruto. Ento, Naruto tenta conquistar Sakura fingindo ser a paixo da vida dela... Sasuke! Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Sasuke E Sakura, Amigos Ou Inimigos
programme.desc: Naruto: Sasuke E Sakura, Amigos Ou Inimigos - T01E03

programme.title: 2020. Com a equipe formada, Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura conhecem seu sensei, o enigmtico Kakashi. Ele prope um desafio que apenas dois deles podem vencer - quem falhar voltar para a Academia Ninja! Mas eles no sabem que Kakashi nunca deixou ningum vencer! Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Aprovar Ou Reprovar Um Exerccio De Sobrevivencia
programme.desc: Naruto: Aprovar Ou Reprovar Um Exerccio De Sobrevivencia - T01E04

programme.title: 2020. Com o iminente risco de falhar, Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura fazem de tudo para passar no rduo teste de sobrevivncia. Mas esses ninjas egostas precisaro escutar as palavras sbias de Kakashi para aprenderem sobre trabalho em equipe! Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Voc Falhou A Deciso Finalde Kakashi
programme.desc: Naruto: Voc Falhou A Deciso Finalde Kakashi - T01E05

programme.title: 2020. Naruto e sua equipe comeam suas primeiras misses de ninja cumprindo tarefas entediantes e bsicas. Cansado e com fome, Naruto desabafa com o Hokage que, entretido, prope uma nova misso: proteger um velho rabugento chamado Tazuna at a casa dele! Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Uma Misso Perigosa, Uma Aventura No Pas Das Ondas
programme.desc: Naruto: Uma Misso Perigosa, Uma Aventura No Pas Das Ondas - T01E06

programme.title: 2020. Naruto e sua equipe chegam ao Pas das Ondas, onde o perverso negociante chamado Gato controla a terra. Gato contrata Zabuza Momochi para matar Tazuna. Animado, Naruto no v a hora de enfrentar esse poderoso ninja assassino. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: O Assassino Da Nvoa - T01E07

programme.title: 2020. Kakashi est em vantagem na batalha contra Zabuza, mas a situao se reverte quando Kakashi preso na Priso de gua de Zabuza! Kakashi insisite para que a equipe fuja, mas Naruto lembra da promessa que fez de nunca mais fugir e decide ficar!! Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: O Juramento De Dor - T01E08

programme.title: 2020. Graas ao plano de Naruto, Kakashi escapa da Priso de gua. Zabuza derrotado e ferido, mas de repente um misterioso ninja rastreador aparece e mata Zabuza. Naruto se espanta ao ver um garoto no muito mais velho que ele derrotar Zabuza to facilmente. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Kakashi, O Guerreiro Sharingan - T01E09

programme.title: 2020. Recuperando-se na casa de Tazuna, Kakashi conclui que Zabuza no morreu e que o jovem ninja o ajudou a escapar! Kakashi decide comear um novo treinamento para ajudar Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura a controlarem melhor seus chakras! Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: A Floresta do Chakra - T01E10

programme.title: 2020. Na aldeia com Tazuna, Sakura v o sofrimento do povo no Pas das Ondas governado por Gato. Tazuna constri uma ponte que dar acesso a outras terras para as pessoas no dependerem mais de Gato. Naruto e Sasuke treinam, usando chakra para subir em rvore. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: A Terra Onde Uma Vez o Heri Viveu
programme.desc: Naruto: A Terra Onde Uma Vez o Heri Viveu - T01E11

programme.title: 2020. Enquanto Naruto treina para controlar seu chacra, algum misterioso aparece de repente e diz que, para se tornar forte, preciso ter determinao para proteger o que ama. A figura misteriosa ecoa o sentimento de Naruto, e os dois sentem uma conexo. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Batalha Na Ponte: Zabuza Retorna - T01E12

programme.title: 2020. hora de lutar contra Zabuza outra vez, e agora ele est acompanhado do ninja rastreador. Os dois reparam as habilidades de Sasuke, e ele percebe o imenso poder do ninja mascarado. Sasuke e o ninja se preparam para lutar, como se o destino os chamasse. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: O Jutsu Secreto De Haku: Espelhos De Cristal De Gelo
programme.desc: Naruto: O Jutsu Secreto De Haku: Espelhos De Cristal De Gelo - T01E13

programme.title: 2020. Sasuke est em apuros dentro dos Espelhos Cristal de Gelo de Haku, e Naruto chega para salv-lo. Sasuke tem um plano para combater o jutsu de Haku, mas falha por causa das aes inesperadas de Naruto. Por fim, os dois jovens ninjas so presos. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: O Ninja Nmero Um Hiper Ativo E Cabea Oca Entram Na Briga
programme.desc: Naruto: O Ninja Nmero Um Hiper Ativo E Cabea Oca Entram Na Briga - T01E14

programme.title: 2020. Vendo que no h tempo a perder, Kakashi decide usar o Sharingan mais uma vez para derrotar Zabuza. Mas Zabuza um ninja experiente em batalhas mortais e, na primeira vez em que enfrentou o Sharingan, Zabuza conseguiu bolar uma estratgia. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Visibilidade Zero: O Sharingan Desvendado - T01E15

programme.title: 2020. Naruto e Sasuke so atacados dentro dos Espelhos Cristal de Gelo de Haku. Durante a batalha, Sasuke percebe o poder do seu prprio Sharingan e comea a desviar dos ataques de Haku. Haku decide acabar com ele. Sasuke usa seu corpo para proteger Naruto... Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: O Selo Quebrado - T01E16

programme.title: 2020. Naruto finalmente explode! Sua raiva por Haku libera o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. O chakra de Naruto est to intenso que at Kakashi e Zabuza, que esto lutando distncia, percebem. Haku incapaz de fazer algo diante do poder secreto de Naruto. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Passado Branco, Ambio Escondida - T01E17

programme.title: 2020. Haku pede a Naruto que acabe com ele. Naruto questiona a filosofia de Haku sobre existir apenas para lutar e ganhar. Enquanto isso, a batalha entre Kakashi e Zabuza chega ao clmax. Com a vitria ao alcance, Kakashi libera sua manobra mais devastadora. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: As Armas Conhecidas Como Shinobi - T01E18

programme.title: 2020. Pensando em Haku, Naruto confronta Zabuza com raiva. Sem demonstrar emoes, Zabuza se sente arrasado pela perda de Haku, a nica pessoa em quem confiava no mundo. Naruto aprende que esse tipo de realidade cruel , de fato, o destino de um ninja. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: O Demnio Na Neve - T01E19

programme.title: 2020. Naruto e sua equipe voltam Aldeia Oculta da Folha depois da batalha do Pas das Ondas. Mesmo concluindo novas misses, Naruto est insatisfeito com a rotina diria, mas logo ele descobre que estrangeiros esto se juntando na Aldeia da Folha. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: A Prova Chunin - T01E20

programme.title: 2020. Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura so escolhidos para fazer a Prova Chunin. Iruka se ope participao dos trs, pois os considera muito novos e inexperientes para o desafio. Kakashi, porm, acredita que eles cresceram e esto mais prontos do que nunca. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Mission: Impossible -- Ghost Protocol (2011)
programme.desc: The IMF is shut down when its implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organizations name.

programme.title: Major League (1989)
programme.desc: Lackluster baseball players (Tom Berenger, Charlie Sheen, Corbin Bernsen) hear their Cleveland teams new owner is counting on them to lose.

programme.title: Trading Places (1983)
programme.desc: Sporting billionaire brothers reverse the roles of a Wall Street commodities broker (Dan Aykroyd) and a street hustler (Eddie Murphy).

programme.title: Erotic Obsession (2017)
programme.desc: Mandy thinks she has found the perfect roommate in her coworker, Michele. But when an innocent comment is misinterpreted by Michele, things quickly escalate from platonic roommates to full on infatuation.

programme.title: Undisputed III: Redemption (2010)
programme.desc: Uri Boyka is an inmate trapped in the toughest prison in the world. He is ready to make his comeback in a lethal boxing competition for a shot at freedom.

programme.title: Dont Knock Twice (2016)
programme.desc: A mother looking to reconnect with her estranged daughter attracts the attention of a demonic witch.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible (1996)
programme.desc: Branded a traitor, an elite intelligence agent (Tom Cruise) investigates a failed Prague mission to retrieve a computer disk.

programme.title: The Martian (2015)
programme.desc: Left behind by his crew, a stranded astronaut must find a way to survive on Mars, while NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring him home.

programme.title: The Last Castle (2001)
programme.desc: A court-martialed general (Robert Redford) leads a revolt against a corrupt warden (James Gandolfini) in a military prison.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray (2014)
programme.desc: A female guard (Kristen Stewart) at Guantanamo Bay forms an unlikely friendship with one of the facilitys longtime detainees.

programme.title: The Road (2009)
programme.desc: A father (Viggo Mortensen) and his son (Kodi Smit-McPhee) try to keep the dream of civilization alive as they wander through a post-apocalyptic landscape.

programme.title: The Haunting (1999)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: Road to Perdition (2002)
programme.desc: Accompanied by his eldest son, a Depression-era mob enforcer (Tom Hanks) seeks revenge after the rest of his family are murdered by his employers (Paul Newman) jealous son.

programme.title: Jack Reacher (2012)
programme.desc: A defense attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Deadlock (2021)
programme.desc: A retired Army ranger must save thousands of innocent lives when a rogue team of mercenaries brutally seizes an energy plant and holds everyone inside hostage.

programme.title: The Martian (2015)
programme.desc: Left behind by his crew, a stranded astronaut must find a way to survive on Mars, while NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring him home.

programme.title: Silence (2016)
programme.desc: Two 17th-century Portuguese missionaries (Andrew Garfield, Adam Driver) face the ultimate test of faith when they travel to Japan to find their missing mentor (Liam Neeson).

programme.title: Sleeping Dogs (2024)
programme.desc: Suffering from memory loss, a former homicide detective tries to solve a brutal murder that he cant recall. As he pieces together evidence from a decade-old investigation, he soon uncovers a sinister web of buried secrets tied to his forgotten past.

programme.title: Rumours (2024)
programme.desc: Leaders of the worlds wealthiest democracies become spectacles of incompetence, contending with increasingly surreal obstacles as night falls in the misty woods and they realize they are suddenly alone.

programme.title: The Comeback Trail (2020)
programme.desc: Indebted to a mobster, a desperate producer tries to "accidentally" kill an aging movie star for an insurance scam. However, he soon begins to realize that the film theyre shooting is a masterpiece in the making.

programme.title: Pixie (2020)
programme.desc: Pixie sets out to avenge her mothers death and attempts a heist that will give her the means to leave her small-town life behind. When the plan goes horribly wrong, shes forced to team up with a pair of misfits who are clearly in over their heads.

programme.title: American Renegades (2017)
programme.desc: On assignment in war-torn Europe, Navy SEALs discover gold at the bottom of a lake -- a fortune rumored to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. When the enemy detects the team, the SEALs are left with only 10 hours to recover the treasure.

programme.title: The Running Man (1987)
programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV hosts (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October (1990)
programme.desc: Moscow, Washington and a CIA analyst (Alec Baldwin) track a renegade Soviet captain (Sean Connery) and his new submarine.
